course_description: Master fundamental data structures through hands-on coding exercises. This course focuses on understanding when and how to use different data structures to solve complex problems efficiently.

unit_1.title: Arrays & Dynamic Arrays
unit_1.description: Foundation of linear data structures - arrays, lists, and dynamic resizing

unit_2.title: Hash Tables Deep Dive
unit_2.description: Master hash tables, collision handling, and real-world applications

unit_3.title: String Processing & Algorithms
unit_3.description: Advanced string manipulation and pattern matching techniques

unit_4.title: Mathematical Problem Solving
unit_4.description: Apply data structures to solve mathematical and logical challenges

unit_5.title: Integration & Optimization
unit_5.description: Combine multiple data structures for complex problem solving

unit_6.title: Capstone Project
unit_6.description: Build a comprehensive project utilizing all learned data structures
